column5: I found this article today and felt that it must be shared with all OFNers. I would like to say Thank You to the CRAA(Credit River Anglers Asssociation), and MEA(Metro East Anglers) for there hard efforts, and tons of volunteer time.     We need our government to help these Organizations with more Funds.  Anyways a great article and love to hear your feedback.  Cheers Al
Fish lifts continue nightly at the streetsville fish ladder over 700 fish to date have been lifted over the dam, a great thing to see or even voenteer to help out. thanks Al for posting it  Louis
